Description: Selling in "new" condition ESP LTD Viper-50 Electric Guitar with soft case. Hardly played and ready to go. No nicks or dings in guitar and plays great. Details from ESP: The ESP LTD Viper-50 Electric Guitar is all about playability. The dual ESP LH-150 pickups buck 60-cycle hum, making them much quieter than single-coil pickups and more powerful. The 24-3/4" scale is slightly shorter than many electric guitars, making for less string tension and easier play. The LTD Viper-50 guitar's basswood body and maple neck with rosewood fretboard promise superb stability and long life. FEATURESBasswood bodyBolt-on maple neckThin U-shaped neck24-3/4" scale length42mm nut widthRosewood fretboardESP LH-150 humbucking pickupsTune-o-matic-style bridgeStopbar tailpiece24 extra-jumbo fretsESP tunersChrome hardwareShips UPS to US only.
Title: ESP LTD Viper-50 Electric Guitar (perfect condition) - with soft case
